remarks: The powerset of a Dedekind-infinite set does not inject into the set of finite sequences.  The proof is due to Halbeisen and Shelah. Proposition 1.7 of [KanamoriPincus] p. 418.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2015.)
statement:
pwfseq $p |- ( _om ~<_ A -> -. ~P A ~<_ U_ n e. _om ( A ^m n ) ) $.
$d A n $.
